title: Alexandra Potora On The Secret To Success & The Key To Productivity
itunes:title: Alexandra Potora On The Secret To Success & The Key To Productivity
description:
#298: On this episode we are joined by Alexandra Potora. Alexandra is a digital creator, entrepreneur, and the founder/CEO of VREA Cosmetics. Alexandra joins the show to discuss how she emigrated from communist Romania to the US to pursue the American Dream. On this episode we discuss how to start from nothing and build a business, the secrets to success, and how to be productive. 

To connect with Alexandra Potora click HERE
